title: Viral Photo of Madrasa Teacher Showing Islam as ‘Superior’ Is Fake
subtitle: Messages were posted in  public groups that have mass following over the social media with the photo where a madrasa teacher has been seen preaching the superiority of Islam. The photo turns out to be fake.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
इन सुअरों द्वारा ये शिक्षा दी जाती है मदरसों में..फिर कहते हैं हिन्दू भाईचारा नही रखते Hinduism -0 and Islam -3 (These pigs teach this in the madrasas .. Then they say Hindus don’t keep the brotherhood Hinduism -0 and Islam -3 ).

This message was posted in a public group named WE SUPPORT NARENDRA MODI, which has more than 28 lakh members. It shows a madrasa teacher claiming Islam to be a superior religion than Hinduism.
